Breastfeeding positions and problems are explained in detail in Newborn and Infant Module. 
 ∙ Observe breastfeeding and check if there is proper attachment and effective suckling. The mothers and 
caregivers should be informed that breastfeeding is the gold standard feeding option for babies.
 ∙ Breastfeed frequently, i.e., at least 6-8 times during the day and 2-3 times during the night.
